content: * Says it acquired mobile phone communication systems from Nokia Solutions and Networks Oy  at a price of T$1.76 billion
name: Chunghwa Telecom Co Ltd
title: BRIEF-Chunghwa Telecom buys mobile phone communication systems for T$1.76 bln

content: * Says it will pay cash dividend of T$4.94 per share for 2016
name: Chunghwa Telecom Co Ltd
title: BRIEF-Chunghwa Telecom to pay cash dividend of T$4.94 per share for 2016

content: Aug 23 Chunghwa Telecom :  * Says it won a construction bid for T$1.28 billion   Source text in Chinese: http://goo.gl/kPyVI8 Further company coverage:    (Beijing Headline News)
name: Chunghwa Telecom Co Ltd
title: BRIEF-Chunghwa Telecom wins construction bid of T$1.28 bln

title: BRIEF-Chunghwa Telecom to pay 2015 dividend on Aug. 26

title: BRIEF-Huge Group in talks involving possibility of two more acquisitions

content: * Ericsson supplies Chunghwa Telecom's entire core network and RAN in Taiwan's most populated areas  including Taipei city  Source text for Eikon:  Further company coverage:

title: BRIEF-Ericsson to support Chunghwa Telecom's LTE expansion

content: * Q4 net loss 306 mln riyals vs net loss of 462.3 mln riyals a yr ago

title: Zain Saudi Q4 net loss narrows  beats forecasts
